attributes.additional_details: People are getting uk tv in spain without paying a tv license but bbc and itv are on a different satellite the uk free view back up one and it would be better if they pay it and get it on the sky box  so it would be easy for sky to get the license and easy for people to watch their shows ,and not having to buy a chinese linux technomate box that goes on a backup satellite
attributes.background: People are getting uk tv in spain without paying a tv license but bbc and itv are on a different satellite the uk free view back up one so people have one sky box for their pay channels and one technomate box for the bbc and itv channel n  it would be better if they pay it and get it on the sky box.
